author: snowbandit7
content: <@686695036733227017> hi! i'm trying to use ephemery testnet for some client testing, but the faucet seems to be configured for an older chain ID - https://faucet.bordel.wtf/

author: tmiychao
content: Thanks for trying it out. The faucet works correctly now, please check check it out and you can also let us know directly in the Ephemery chat https://matrix.to/#/#staker-testnet:matrix.org
